text: Miroslav "Miro" Steržaj (28 February 1933 – 8 November 2020) was a Slovene 9 pin bowling player, politician and businessman. He was born in Rakek, Municipality of Cerknica. From 1988 to 1992, he was mayor of Ljutomer. Steržaj died on 8 November 2020 in Ljutomer at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovenian sportspeople Category:Slovenian politicians Category:Slovenian businesspeople
title: Miro Steržaj
